actions.committee: Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to amend the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to assist State and local educational agencies in establishing teacher recruitment centers, teacher internship programs, and mobile professional development teams, and for other purposes.
short_title: Teacher Recruitment, Development, and Retention Act of 2001

summary.text: Teacher Recruitment, Development, and Retention Act of 2001 - Amends the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to authorize the Secretary of Education to make grants for: (1) State teacher recruitment centers, to State educational agencies (SEAs); (2) teacher internship programs, to SEAs and local educational agencies; and (3) mobile professional development teams, to SEAs.

titles.title: Teacher Recruitment, Development, and Retention Act of 2001

A bill to amend the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to assist State and local educational agencies in establishing teacher recruitment centers, teacher internship programs, and mobile professional development teams, and for other purposes.
